Introduction

The Rose is a South Korean rock band currenty under Windfall, Transparent Arts and Wasserman. The group consists of four members: Woosung, Dojoon, Hajoong, and Jaehyeong. They started off as an indie band before eventually debuting as a band under J&Star Company with their first single "Sorry".

In 2020, the group requested for their contract with J&Star to be terminated, which also prevented them from releasing new music. After a year of court battle, the band was eventually able to cut ties with the company.

As of 2021, three members of the band have enlisted in the military. The group is set to reunite and release new music after the members' discharge from their service.

As of 2022, Dojoon, Hajoon, and Jaehyeong have returned from their military services.
